Key Match Events: Cape Verde won 3-0 against Mozambique with goals from Bebe (32'), Mendes (51'), and Pina (69').
Cabral received a yellow card at the 61st minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde seek qualification from their Africa Cup of Nations group when they take on Mozambique.
Cape Verde began their Group B journey with a victory over Ghana, while Mozambique suffered a late loss against Egypt.
Cape Verde are keen to secure maximum points to assure them of a spot in the round of 16.
Mozambique hopes to recover from their disappointment against Egypt.
